hypothesis_content.title: Volatility Expansion Breakout from Multi-Day Compression
hypothesis_content.statement: When BTC trades within a 3% range for 7+ consecutive days (compression) during NEUTRAL regime, then breaks above the range with >1.5x average volume, entering long will capture a directional trend as volatility expands, with outsized moves in the breakout direction.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Volatility compression often precedes expansion. Neutral regimes provide balanced risk/reward. Volume confirms institutional participation. The breakout direction tends to persist as trapped positions are forced to adjust. Targeting 12% captures most of the initial expansion move.
entry_conditions: BTC daily high-low range < 3% for ≥7 days
No major resistance within 5% above breakout

exit_conditions.take_profit: 12% gain OR daily ATR expands to >3x pre-breakout ATR

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Breakout success rate (close above range 5 days later) < 60%, OR median gain after valid breakout < 5%.
